name: cologne-raves
description: Cologne Raves - Event tracking and management system for Cologne's music scene.

scripts.check: tsx scripts/validate-events.ts && astro build && node scripts/fix-sitemap.js && tsc && wrangler deploy --dry-run
scripts.deploy: astro build && node scripts/fix-sitemap.js && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:dry-run: astro build && node scripts/fix-sitemap.js && wrangler deploy --dry-run
scripts.preview: astro build && node scripts/fix-sitemap.js && wrangler dev
